description:
Bunji comes home after losing a fight. Mom thinks that, since Dad is never around, Bunji never learned how to fight. So, she starts the "Men`s intensive training month."; Bunji, Ma, and Chi, all good friends, form an idiotic trio. The three of them are always so lively! Then, on a rainy day, they`re all in the Kamohara home...; Through her work, Mom meets an idol and is impressed by the many feminine charms she has. Hearing her speak, Mom, in a flurry of stupidity, forces poor Fumi to dance.; It`s early afternoon and Mom is sleeping, not doing any work. Just before, Bunji almost did something very dangerous, but he got away okay. She feels so relieved and dozes off...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What It Means To Be a Boy / Three Stupid Boys / Feminine Charms / The Road to Napping
男子たるもの / 三バカ / 女の単位 / うたたねへの道
